title: Nina Dobrev Got Ready for the NYCB Gala With Help From Shaun White and Her Dog
excerpt: Ahead of the NYCB Fall Fashion Gala, the actress shares her prep routine, which includes a visit from her Olympian boyfriend and a furry friend.
text: Emma Beiles PhotographyAccessories make the whole look pop—especially these earrings.Emma Beiles PhotographyGlam session essentials: a cup of coffee and my favorite furry friend.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowEmma Beiles PhotographyI always feel my best when collaborating with my incredible glam team. Grateful for the magic we create together.Emma Beiles PhotographyJust a touch of magic before stepping out.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowEmma Beiles PhotographyChilling and a red lip—my go-to glam.Emma Beiles PhotographyAll dressed up and ready for the ballet.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowEmma Beiles PhotographyShaun working his magic—always the best at making me laugh before I run out.Emma Beiles PhotographyReady in a New York minute!Dale Arden Chong is the senior fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she edits and reports on the latest trends, labels, and designers in the fashion space to bring you the best items that will elevate your wardrobe. With a passion for great sartorial stories and getting dressed (as well as a knack for nerding out over the details), she has a robust knowledge of high-quality design, construction, and materials based on testing hundreds of products over her eight-plus years in the industry, writing stories for Glamour, Who What Wear, Entertainment Tonight, and others. So, if you ask her for a shopping recommendation, she’ll give you five picks plus her honest, unfiltered opinions. Dale graduated magna cum laude from the University of Southern California’s Annenberg School for Communication and Journalism with a degree in Journalism and a minor in Communication Design. In 2015, she was a finalist for the National Arts and Entertainment Journalism Award in the Online category of “Commentary/Analysis/Trend” for her article “Calvin Klein Underwear: What Is Plus Size?” Outside of the style world, her hobbies include cooking, playing tennis, ceramics, and watching BTS dance videos on YouTube, among other things. Follow her on Instagram at @dalearden.

Accessories make the whole look pop—especially these earrings.

Glam session essentials: a cup of coffee and my favorite furry friend.

I always feel my best when collaborating with my incredible glam team. Grateful for the magic we create together.

Just a touch of magic before stepping out.

Chilling and a red lip—my go-to glam.

All dressed up and ready for the ballet.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Shaun working his magic—always the best at making me laugh before I run out.

Ready in a New York minute!

Dale Arden Chong is the senior fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she edits and reports on the latest trends, labels, and designers in the fashion space to bring you the best items that will elevate your wardrobe. With a passion for great sartorial stories and getting dressed (as well as a knack for nerding out over the details), she has a robust knowledge of high-quality design, construction, and materials based on testing hundreds of products over her eight-plus years in the industry, writing stories for Glamour, Who What Wear, Entertainment Tonight, and others. So, if you ask her for a shopping recommendation, she’ll give you five picks plus her honest, unfiltered opinions. Dale graduated magna cum laude from the University of Southern California’s Annenberg School for Communication and Journalism with a degree in Journalism and a minor in Communication Design. In 2015, she was a finalist for the National Arts and Entertainment Journalism Award in the Online category of “Commentary/Analysis/Trend” for her article “Calvin Klein Underwear: What Is Plus Size?” Outside of the style world, her hobbies include cooking, playing tennis, ceramics, and watching BTS dance videos on YouTube, among other things. Follow her on Instagram at @dalearden.
